summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from September 2021 regarding outreach to Victim Specialists (VSs) in the Epstein/Maxwell case. The email discusses drafting a request for VSs to provide communications and contact information related to victims, witnesses, and attorneys.

persons.name: Program Manager
persons.context: The sender of the initial email, identified as a Program Manager in the FBI Victim Services Division, is drafting an email to Victim Specialists and seeks clarification on what information to request.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively coordinating with Victim Specialists regarding the Epstein/Maxwell case as of September 2021.
The FBI was seeking to collect communications (texts, emails) involving victims, witnesses, and attorneys, along with associated names and phone numbers.
The email indicates an internal review process, as the draft request required supervisor approval before being sent to the Victim Specialists.
